ygData.subject: RE: Stealth improvements
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes and I also have noticed bizzare NPC behavior since the patch...NPCs of all kinds...wandering around and then all of the sudden breaking into a jog as
ygData.messageBody:
Yes and I also have noticed bizzare NPC behavior since the patch...NPCs of
all kinds...wandering around and then all of the sudden breaking into a jog
as though they just remembered they had to be somewhere. Strange.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
> Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 10:38 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Stealth improvements
>
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> Has anyone else noticed that since the last patch that
> click-targetting has
> gotten a lot better? I can now MUCH more easy target a
> player or mob that is
> partially obstructed by another player or mob. I used to
> have to just run
> around the mob in front to target the one behind. If you
> haven't noticed yet,
> try targetting different people that are close together like
> at a city or
> outside a zone healing/medding. For ME anyhow, it's working
> much better.
>
> Crier Sharpsong - 25th song bard on Fennin Ro
>
> Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
